means.word_mean: 计划外的,意料外的,随意的
额外的,不必要的,可有可无的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in senses 2 and 3 of the adjective): from late Latin accidentalis, from Latin accident- 'happening' (see accident)

entry.def: An accidental event happens by chance or as the result of an accident, and is not deliberately intended.

example.ex: The jury returned a verdict of accidental death...
example.tran: 陪审团作出意外死亡的正式裁决。

example.ex: His hand brushed against hers; it could have been either accidental or deliberate.
example.tran: 就在有意无意间，他的手轻轻拂过她的手。

means.word_mean: 1. a musical notation that makes a note sharp or flat or natural although that is not part of the key signature
1. associated by chance and not an integral part;

sentences.sentence: "poetry is something to which words are the accidental, not by any means the essential form"- Frederick W. Robertson
"they had to decide whether his misconduct was adventitious or the result of a flaw in his character"

means.word_mean: 2. occurring or appearing or singled out by chance;

sentences.sentence: "their accidental meeting led to a renewal of their friendship"

means.word_mean: 3. without intention (especially resulting from heedless action);

sentences.sentence: "with an inadvertent gesture she swept the vase off the table"

auth_sentence.content: Dogs are more susceptible to accidental poisoning than cats.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dogs are more susceptible to accidental poisoning than cats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dogs are more susceptible to accidental poisoning than cats.

auth_sentence.content: Cases of accidental pet poisonings are on the rise.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cases of accidental pet poisonings are on the rise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cases of accidental pet poisonings are on the rise.

auth_sentence.content: The report states that she died by accidental drowning.
auth_sentence.res_content: The report states that she died by accidental drowning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The report states that she died by accidental drowning.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fall,表示"落下,降临"; 2. 引申为偶然发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的;意外的;无意中的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accident[n.意外之事,灾害]+al……的→adj.偶然的;意外的;无意中的
de去掉+cid落+uous……的→使[树叶]掉下→落叶的
ac加强+cid落下,降临+ent→意外的掉下

stems_affixes.value_cn: 落下的方式, 影响范围
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+cid落下+ence表名词→掉下来的概率→发生事件的范围→影响范围
in进入+cid落下+ent→掉进来的事件
co共同+in进入+cid落下+e→共同落进

means.word_mean: 意外的; 偶然(发生)的

sentences.en: Our meeting in New York was quite accidental.
sentences.cn: 我们在纽约的会见完全是偶然的。

jushi.english: He can face the accidental trouble.
jushi.chinese: 他能够面对意外的困难。

jushi.english: We are talking about a verdict of accidental death.
jushi.chinese: 我们正在谈论一次意外死亡的裁决。

jushi.english: Our accidental meeting led to our becoming friends.
jushi.chinese: 我们的偶然相遇使我们成为朋友。
